description:
A complete camp cook system for those who like to go it alone. The Glacier Camp stove pumps out a solid 11,000 BTU to cook up 1-pot meals or boil water, and the durable stainless steel pot cooks evenly on the stove or over the fire. Everything packs together, with room for a fuel canister, to take up barely any space in your pack.

  • Glacier Camp Stove has a micro control valve and can simmer
  • Serrated and stable pot support arms
  • Heavy-duty 1.1L Glacier Stainless pot has a folding handle
  • Includes folding Foon and mesh stuff sack
  • System nests together with room for 230g fuel canister
name: GSI Glacier Stainless Explorer Set
